name: rc-compiler
description: very fast js compiler angular-way style

scripts.test: compile('var fs = require('fs');var template = require('../rc-compiler').compile(fs.readFileSync('./templates/simple.html'));var html = template({title: 'Page title',users: [{name: 'Maria', age: 27},{name: 'Mike', age: 32}],showUsers: true});console.log(html);');
